duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage inbound logistics scheduling and throughput for distribution centers using the TMS Appointment Process.
Act as the point of contact for inbound carriers, scheduling, and load prioritization.
Compile and report on inbound load data to measure execution and decision making.
Provide professional communication to carriers and answer inquiries in a timely manner.
Monitor and report on carriers' information for accurate execution and reporting.
Complete basic data reporting and provide advice on completion, transit, delivery dates, and possible delays.
Understand and advise on third-party carrier service performance, service level, and logistics cost metrics.
Perform crossdock, backhaul, routing, receiving, and selection responsibilities as needed.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED equivalent and/or equivalent related experience.
